hopobject.name: 0xdroid
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.6) Gecko/20091215 Ubuntu/10.04 (lucid) Firefox/3.5.6
hopobject.body:
0xlab develops Android distributions and attempts to introduce some improvements recently. Currently, 0xdroid supports TI Beagleboard as reference hardware.
Roadmap: http://code.google.com/p/0xdroid/wiki/Roadmap Source repository: http://gitorious.org/0xdroid Wiki: http://code.google.com/p/0xdroid/w/list
hopobject.shortdesc: 0xlab's enhanced Android distribution, highly tweaked for Beagleboard
